topic.title: size limit for zite
topic.body:
when i try to sign and publish.. it says
"
Content signing failed
Content too large
"
and it probably is too large. it's intended to be large.
is there a way to publish a zite that's very large?

1578809973_152JLSuJAhrKabbvowpHjq5W6Tzpx.body:
i think i have an answer to my own question.
if you pull out the sidebar for your site..
you can manually change your own size limits to something much larger.
#noobquestion
